fields.description: Search bar filtering seems busted on alarm history page.  Screenshot attached.
fields.summary: Alarm history page doesn't allow filtering by text or item type

comments.body:
gosh, this worked when I added the filters a week and a half ago.
Text filtering may not be done though, I only implement the facet. filter_keys probably needs to be set to appropriate fields on the history items.
[~dkavanagh]: Could you point us to the commit or PR where you added search facets for the alarm history page?
It was merged last week, not hard to find: https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1941
[~dkavanagh]: PR 1941 was for the alarms landing page, while this ticket is for the alarm history page.  Please clarify.
so it is! nm all my comment then!

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1954

For QA and reviewer;
fixed breadcrumbs "CloudWatchAlarms" changed to "Alarms"
fixed history reload, needed to base64 encode alarm id in request
fixed text filtering to immediately filter while typing
fixed facet filtering, needed to remove toLowerCase() of facet name

[~dkavanagh]: I tested the GUI-2614 branch against the latest dev cloud with acct-02/admin and am noticing the following issues (tested in Safari and Firefox on Mac OS 10.10)...

- Filtering by Type displays zero results (tested with ConfigurationUpdate and StateUpdate)
- When a Type facet filter is applied, clicking the 'x' to remove the facet doesn't display all results
- Free-text filtering seems to work, but when I remove the text with the backspace the full list of entries isn't restored unless I hit backspace one extra time after wiping out the text

[~dkavanagh]: Much better! There seems to be an issue when selecting multiple values for the Type facet though.

Here's what I'm observing...
1. Select Type facet and choose ConfigurationUpdate
2. History is properly filtered to only show ConfigurationUpdate items
3. Add another Type facet, selecting StateUpdate
4. History displays items of type ConfigurationUpdate and StateUpdate (so far so good)
5. Click the x to remove the second facet (Type = StateUpdate)
6. Both facets are removed, but the history lists only items with Type=ConfigurationUpdate
[~dkavanagh]: Could you remove the console.log statements in alarm_history.js while looking into the latest issues I noted?

[~dkavanagh]: Sorry to punt this back, but I noticed one more issue.  When filtering by type (e.g. Type=ConfigurationUpdate), the filter is properly applied.  However, all items are shown (and the Type filter remains) when I hit the reload icon.
[~dkavanagh]: https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1954 looks good to me.  Passing review torch to [~ashamblin].
I am able to search by text and type, the reload is working as expected as well
